sounds.name: Rain
sounds.description: Rain sounds create a calming atmosphere reminiscent of a cozy hideaway, perfect for relaxation and reflection.

sounds.name: Ocean
sounds.description: The ocean sounds transport you to a serene beach setting, perfect for unwinding and meditating.

sounds.name: Wind
sounds.description: Gentle wind sounds bring the ambiance of a breezy day, ideal for stress relief and mindfulness.

sounds.name: Thunderstorm
sounds.description: Thunderstorm sounds are great for those who enjoy the dramatic rumble of nature to relax or sleep better.
